item.title: yaml-schema
item.description: cdsctl tools yaml-schema Generate and install CDS yaml schema for given IDE Synopsis Generate and install CDS yaml schema for given IDE cdsctl tools yaml-schema IDE-NAME Examples cdsctl tools yaml-schema vscode Options inherited from parent commands -c, --context string cdsctl context name -f, --file string set configuration file --insecure (SSL) This option explicitly allows curl to perform "insecure" SSL connections and transfers. -n, --no-interactive Set to disable interaction with ctl --verbose Enable verbose output SEE ALSO cdsctl tools - Some tooling for CDS
